Scene:
The Pawnshop
(Shichimise / 質店)

Play: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (染模様妹背門松)

Production: January 1977



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))
